rev.desc.rev.desc: When opening an Interaction from a CI, field values are not being copied as defined in the Link record "screlate.device.incidents"

1. In RAD "cc.first", new a decision panel, when the $L.blank=$INTO.RECORD is null , then call panel "init.file", else set $L.blank to $L.file and call "init.copy". In the panel "start" exist normal is new panel name.
2. Changed the Link record "screlate.device.incidents" to use "logical.name" in place of "affected.item" .
Changed environment variable from $G.sm.global.environment to $L.env on panels get.object, call.open and call.view.
Updated incident matching code.
Added functionality to allow for Qopen of a call to no longer return to a blank call. This is done by changing the Action on the QOpen displayoption from "log" to "logexit".
Externalized save and close messages by calling us.notify instead of message.
Modified set.iknow to handle the Knowlix return string differently when on an mvs system.
Changed the normal exit in clone and clone.unlock to clone.copy.fields to call us.copy.open.link.
Removed check for Action of log and complete to set handle.time on log panel. This will allow for handle.time to be set on any action that saves the call.

In the start panel, changed '$L.handle.start=0' to 'if (not null($L.file)) then ($L.handle.start=tod()) else ($L.handle.start=0)'. In post.display panel, changed 5th line from 'if ($L.x~=1) then ($L.handle.start=$L.x in $L.messages)' to 'if ($L.x~=1 and $L.handle.start=0) then ($L.handle.start=$L.x in $L.messages)'. Finally, in panel flag.dirty, changed '$L.handle.start=tod()' to 'if ($L.handle.start=0) then ($L.handle.start=tod())'
Knowlix integration changes.
Deleted extraneous panels.
Added "retrieve.kpak" option.
Change the mode to add when accepting a newcall (CTI).
Pass in the unchanged file variable to display.
Changed exit on test.match panel to go to decide.blank for check of return to blank call.
Changed the mode on panel setup.display.0 after reselect of the incident when returning from problem management from update to browse. Also set $L.locked=false
use $G.sm.*
Set $L.locked=false after unlocking the record in the "undo" path.
Converted messages to scmsg().
No longer skips the message creation panel when opening a problem from the call.
Now doesn't modify $L.file after the fduplicate() has happened.
New cancel exit in apm.get.sla.
Moved callpath required event.send call into cc.router.
New parameter for sc.knowledge.
Don't send events when in text mode.
Use screlate when creating problems.
Added views.
Added support for Callpath conference.
Added support for Callpath transfer.
Don't save the call when the Show Related button is pressed. Just call cc.find.related and return to the call screen.
After saving the record, reselect it. This avoids a locking reselect caused by iscurrent($L.file)=unknown.
Put in new reselect code, to reselect the call if it has been modified since it was selected.
Set first.call=true if the call is closed from cc.first, else set it to false.
Moved locking check into displayoptions.
Lock the record before calling options that can modify the record.
Called new screlate.associate instead of many other associate apps.
Only check canclose if closing the call - either by setting open="Closed" or by pressing the Close button.
Added code to handle delayed number assigning.
used same(blank.call in $G.pm.environment, true) to avoid the "unknown" problem.
Added ability to use $L.action="save" to save the call and return to the same screen.
nullsub the blank.call check to false on decide.blank panel.
Added checks for $G.prompt.for.save when exiting a call.
Recompiled due to change in cc.find.related
Changed message on close to save "closed" not "saved".
Added a message when cloning a call.
switched the normal exit from the display.decide panel from fill to display
Added code to get SLA IDs and check service hours.
Also checks when returning from creating a change or request.
Added an option to the PM environment record to allow the user to return to a blank screen or to the same call after creating a problem.
If we set the open field to "Closed" in the code then when validation is failed set it back to the starting value.

descript.descript: When opening an Interaction from a CI, field values are not being copied as defined in the Link record "screlate.device.incidents"

1. In RAD "cc.first", new a decision panel, when the $L.blank=$INTO.RECORD is null , then call panel "init.file", else set $L.blank to $L.file and call "init.copy". In the panel "start" exist normal is new panel name.
2. Changed the Link record "screlate.device.incidents" to use "logical.name" in place of "affected.item" .
Changed environment variable from $G.sm.global.environment to $L.env on panels get.object, call.open and call.view.
Updated incident matching code.
Added functionality to allow for Qopen of a call to no longer return to a blank call. This is done by changing the Action on the QOpen displayoption from "log" to "logexit".
Externalized save and close messages by calling us.notify instead of message.
Modified set.iknow to handle the Knowlix return string differently when on an mvs system.
Changed the normal exit in clone and clone.unlock to clone.copy.fields to call us.copy.open.link.
Removed check for Action of log and complete to set handle.time on log panel. This will allow for handle.time to be set on any action that saves the call.

In the start panel, changed '$L.handle.start=0' to 'if (not null($L.file)) then ($L.handle.start=tod()) else ($L.handle.start=0)'. In post.display panel, changed 5th line from 'if ($L.x~=1) then ($L.handle.start=$L.x in $L.messages)' to 'if ($L.x~=1 and $L.handle.start=0) then ($L.handle.start=$L.x in $L.messages)'. Finally, in panel flag.dirty, changed '$L.handle.start=tod()' to 'if ($L.handle.start=0) then ($L.handle.start=tod())'
Knowlix integration changes.
Deleted extraneous panels.
Added "retrieve.kpak" option.
Change the mode to add when accepting a newcall (CTI).
Pass in the unchanged file variable to display.
Changed exit on test.match panel to go to decide.blank for check of return to blank call.
Changed the mode on panel setup.display.0 after reselect of the incident when returning from problem management from update to browse. Also set $L.locked=false
use $G.sm.*
Set $L.locked=false after unlocking the record in the "undo" path.
Converted messages to scmsg().
No longer skips the message creation panel when opening a problem from the call.
Now doesn't modify $L.file after the fduplicate() has happened.
New cancel exit in apm.get.sla.
Moved callpath required event.send call into cc.router.
New parameter for sc.knowledge.
Don't send events when in text mode.
Use screlate when creating problems.
Added views.
Added support for Callpath conference.
Added support for Callpath transfer.
Don't save the call when the Show Related button is pressed. Just call cc.find.related and return to the call screen.
After saving the record, reselect it. This avoids a locking reselect caused by iscurrent($L.file)=unknown.
Put in new reselect code, to reselect the call if it has been modified since it was selected.
Set frst.call=true if the call is closed from cc.first, else set it to false.
Moved locking check into displayoptions.
Lock the record before calling options that can modify the record.
Called new screlate.associate instead of many other associate apps.
Only check canclose if closing the call - either by setting open="Closed" or by pressing the Close button.
Added code to handle delayed number assigning.
used same(blank.call in $G.pm.environment, true) to avoid the "unknown" problem.
Added ability to use $L.action="save" to save the call and return to the same screen.
nullsub the blank.call check to false on decide.blank panel.
Added checks for $G.prompt.for.save when exiting a call.
Recompiled due to change in cc.find.related
Changed message on close to save "closed" not "saved".
Added a message when cloning a call.
switched the normal exit from the display.decide panel from fill to display
Added code to get SLA IDs and check service hours.
Also checks when returning from creating a change or request.
Added an option to the PM environment record to allow the user to return to a blank screen or to the same call after creating a problem.
If we set the open field to "Closed" in the code then when validation is failed set it back to the starting value.
